description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Warriors beware! You will need all your strength and ability. First, learn everything you need in the training mode. Next, crush your rivals in 4 different arenas. Fight!
